particle: pin | ls: r[cid,  pin] := *particle{cid}, not *pin{cid: cid, type}, pin=0
?[pinned, cid, mime, text, size] := r[cid, pinned], *particle{cid:cid, mime, text, size}
particle: filter: ?[cid, text] := *particle{cid, mime, text, blocks, size, size_local, type}, mime="text/plain"
link: history: pf[mime, text, from, to, direction, timestamp] := *link{from, to,timestamp}, *particle{cid: from, text, mime}, direction='from'
pf[mime, text, from, to, direction, timestamp] := *link{from, to, timestamp}, *particle{cid: to, text, mime}, direction='to'
?[timestamp, direction, text, mime, from, to] := pf[mime, text, from, to, direction, timestamp]
tx: list with trim: ?[type, v_trim, success, t] := *transaction{type, value, success, timestamp}, v_trim = from_substrings(slice(chars(dump_json(value)),0, 100)),  t = format_timestamp(timestamp/1000)
tx: parse delegations: ?[a, d, timestamp] := *transaction{type, value, timestamp}, type = 'cosmos.staking.v1beta1.MsgDelegate', a_ = get(value,'amount'), a = get(a_, 'amount'), d = get(a_, 'denom')
tx: parse cyberlinks: ?[from, to, t] := *transaction{type, value, timestamp}, type = 'cyber.graph.v1beta1.MsgCyberlink', links = get(value, 'links'), l_ = get(links, 0), from =get(l_,'from'), to =get(l_,'to'), t = format_timestamp(timestamp/1000)
sense: dt[entry_type, id, unread_count, timestamp_update, timestamp_read, last_id, meta, value, type] := *sync_status{entry_type, id, unread_count, timestamp_update, timestamp_read, last_id, meta}, entry_type=1, *transaction{hash: last_id, value, type}

dt[entry_type, id, unread_count, timestamp_update, timestamp_read, last_id, meta, value, type] := *sync_status{entry_type, id, unread_count, timestamp_update, timestamp_read, last_id, meta}, entry_type=2, *particle{cid: last_id, text, mime}, value=text, type=mime

dt[entry_type, id, unread_count, timestamp_update, timestamp_read, last_id, meta, value, type] := *sync_status{entry_type, id, unread_count, timestamp_update, timestamp_read, last_id, meta}, entry_type=2, not *particle{cid: last_id, text, mime}, value='', type=''
?[entry_type, id, unread_count, timestamp_update, timestamp_read, last_id, meta, value, type] := dt[entry_type, id, unread_count, timestamp_update, timestamp_read, last_id, meta, value, type]
